result.markdown: --- title: "Week 6: Exponential smoothing" --- ::: {.cell} ::: ## What you will learn this week * Exponential smoothing methods with trend and seasonality * ETS models * Automatic model selection using the AICc ## Pre-class activities Read [Chapter 8 of the textbook](https://otexts.com/fpp3/expsmooth.html) and watch all embedded videos ## Exercises (on your own or in tutorial) Complete Exercises 1-4, 16, 17 from [Section 8.8 of the book](https://otexts.com/fpp3/expsmooth-exercises.html). ## Slides for seminar Download pdf ## Seminar activities ## Assignments * [Assignment 3](assignments/A3.qmd) is due on Friday 12 April.
